title: Help
content:
Hi, can anyone help me with this?  
I need to know what fonts are these for an adaptation of the film "The cabinet of Dr. Caligari" (GER/1920).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034611im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_5382.jpg)

Thanks for the help.
author: alexandreteles

comments.content: Please post this in the correct forum for type id's: [TypeID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034611/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid)
